name: ExtensionUKCoreEthnicCategory
title: Extension UK Core Ethnic Category
description: This extension extends the Patient resource to support the exchange of ethnic category information, as a Codeable Concept, which is currently not supported by the FHIR standard.
purpose: Information that describes the patient's ethnic category.
